page.title: 17THE MINERS' STRIKE
page.content: One man was killed because of the strike.A bunch of striking miners threw a brick through his brothers window.This made the brother mad so he went outside telling his brother to stay indoors.Taking no notice he followed his brother out.Five minutes later the two brothers were still fighting with the miners.One brother was badly beaten up but the other was worse.he was taken into hospital and lapsed into a coma.A few weeks later he died.This was tragic for his family and friends.The men were charged with manslaughter and even his brother was charged with a criminal act.This caused a lot of aggravation. Some time later the striking miners had a meeting and decided to go back to work.
